name: Ali Karizi
story: Ali Karizi is a young, talented recruit who has proven himself as a proficient Recon JTAC. He comes from a family of military officers and has always been passionate about serving his country. Despite his young age, Ali is confident and assertive in his role, which has earned him the respect of his superiors and fellow soldiers. However, he struggles with his personal beliefs and the sacrifices he has to make in the line of duty.
